I am a Japanese major, but even us Japanese majors have friends who don't speak it and need a good fansub. These guys have 100% the best translation out of all the groups I looked at. Video could be better, so in my case, I re-encode it :). Problem solved

Ok so I compared IEA's subs with Mamiko's. On the surfaces Mamiko's encode seems superior, but in reality IEA's subs were less distracting and the encode was good.  Thumbs up for this version.

Picked up KSH-IEA as of ep 25+. Don't know what all the bitching is about. Visually appealing fonts, good karaoke, accurate translations and good quality 720p releases. These guys are now my new main group for FT
